diagnostic_plan_over_time.title: Baseline & Initial Response (Months 1-3)
diagnostic_plan_over_time.notes: The initial phase focuses on establishing a comprehensive health baseline and monitoring the immediate effects of the first lifestyle interventions.

monthly_plans.title: Comprehensive Baseline
monthly_plans.objective: To get a complete, multi-faceted view of Rohan's current health status, with a particular focus on his primary goals of cardiovascular health and cognitive performance.
monthly_plans.tests: A wide-ranging panel including advanced lipid markers (ApoB, Lp(a)), inflammatory markers (hs-CRP), metabolic health (OGTT), and fitness (VO2 Max).
monthly_plans.rationale: This initial data collection is crucial for creating a truly personalized plan and understanding the root causes of any potential issues.

monthly_plans.title: Targeted Follow-Up
monthly_plans.objective: To quickly assess the early impact of dietary and exercise changes on the key areas of concern identified in Month 1.
monthly_plans.tests: A focused look at the primary biomarkers of concern: ApoB and hs-CRP.
monthly_plans.rationale: This agile approach allows for rapid feedback, ensuring the initial plan is effective and allowing for course correction without waiting a full three months.

monthly_plans.title: Three-Month Comprehensive Review
monthly_plans.objective: To conduct the first major review of Rohan's progress across all key health domains, as mandated by the program structure.
monthly_plans.tests: A repeat of the comprehensive Month 1 panel to track changes in cardiovascular, metabolic, and fitness markers. A DEXA scan is scheduled to get a baseline for body composition.
monthly_plans.rationale: This full review provides a robust dataset to measure the effectiveness of the initial three-month strategy and to inform planning for the next phase.

diagnostic_plan_over_time.title: Optimization & Deeper Insights (Months 4-6)
diagnostic_plan_over_time.notes: With foundational improvements underway, this phase shifts focus to optimizing performance and digging deeper into metabolic and hormonal health.

monthly_plans.title: Cognitive & Stress Assessment
monthly_plans.objective: To quantify Rohan's cognitive performance and establish a baseline for his stress levels, aligning with his stated goals.
monthly_plans.tests: Formal cognitive function tests and a mental health review are introduced. Key physical markers (ApoB, hs-CRP) continue to be monitored.
monthly_plans.rationale: This introduces new, specific data layers to the plan, allowing for targeted interventions in the areas of cognitive enhancement and stress resilience.

monthly_plans.title: Metabolic & Hormonal Deep Dive
monthly_plans.objective: To gain a more granular understanding of Rohan's metabolic response and hormonal status.
monthly_plans.tests: A focused look at metabolic function (OGTT) and a full hormone panel (Thyroid, Sex Hormones).
monthly_plans.rationale: Fine-tuning these systems is key to unlocking higher levels of energy, recovery, and overall performance.

monthly_plans.title: Six-Month Comprehensive Review
monthly_plans.objective: A major assessment of the program's success at the halfway point, with a focus on confirming the significant improvements in cardiovascular risk.
monthly_plans.tests: A repeat of the comprehensive panel. An advanced cardiovascular assessment, a Coronary Calcium Score, is scheduled to get a direct look at heart health. A follow-up DEXA scan measures changes in body composition.
monthly_plans.rationale: This review validates the effectiveness of the multi-pillar strategy and provides the confidence to move into more advanced, proactive health screening.

diagnostic_plan_over_time.title: Proactive & Future-Focused Health (Months 7-8)
diagnostic_plan_over_time.notes: In the final phase, the diagnostic plan transitions from fixing current issues to proactively screening for future risks and solidifying long-term health.

monthly_plans.title: Advanced Genetic & Cellular Markers
monthly_plans.objective: To explore genetic predispositions and biological aging, shifting to a long-term, preventative health focus.
monthly_plans.tests: Introduction of genetic (ApoE4) and biological age (TruAge) testing.
monthly_plans.rationale: This data helps to create a highly personalized, long-term longevity strategy that accounts for Rohan's unique genetic profile.

monthly_plans.title: Final Review & Long-Term Baseline
monthly_plans.objective: To confirm sustained success in all key areas and establish a new, optimized baseline for Rohan's ongoing health management.
monthly_plans.tests: A final check of all primary progress markers (ApoB, hs-CRP, VO2 Max, Cognitive Score). A full-body MRI is scheduled as a proactive, long-term cancer screening measure.
monthly_plans.rationale: This final assessment provides a comprehensive 'graduation' report, equipping Rohan with a clear understanding of his health status and a forward-looking plan for the future.
